description:
This movie started off as a "There" video. Although I like the chance to mess around with a model, I still feel like its better that I stay behind the camera. And I wanted the video to be all about Jude getting fucked by Josh's ginormous cock.
The video starts off kind of Point of View (POV), but filming a video POV when you aren't actually the person doing the fucking, was too much of a challenge.
I soon pulled back and switched to Third Person point of view.
This one isn't a super fast-paced fucking scene, as it's a major undertaking getting that giant cock up an ass. Though I have to admit upon putting this video together, Jude was seldom soft while getting pounded by it, and I think we have a true bottom on our hands. Though he sure does like to Top as well. Can you be Voraciously Versatile?
There are some fun out takes at the end of the scene that totally makes this video "Complete" but interupted the flow when mixed in to the video. Be sure to stay tuned for that at the end.
Enjoy!
title: Josh Messick & Jude - Wrapped
